name: Scroll
description: A message delivered by the messenger to Griswold, containing information that shifts his focus and hints at a larger narrative.

name: Vayne
description: A character who mocks Kael’s attempts to learn the Soulforge ability.

name: Kael
description: The protagonist of the story, newly discovered the Soulforge ability and is learning to control it.

name: Blacksmith’s Guild
description: The location where Kael and Griswold work and where Kael is learning to use the Soulforge ability.

name: Forge Fatigue
description: A warning sign experienced when using the Soulforge ability, indicating overexertion and the need for control.

name: Griswold
description: Kael’s mentor and a skilled blacksmith who guides him in learning the Soulforge ability.

name: Messenger
description: Delivers a scroll to Griswold, altering his demeanor and hinting at future events.

name: Soulforge
description: A newly discovered magical ability that Kael possesses, allowing him to imbue objects with magical energy.
